fieldset.div:
Kuching Cat Museum
Built in the in city of cats, Kuching,s Cat Museum is the World's First Cat Museum ! With many attractions inside such as exhibits, photos, feline art and cat souvenirs, it is for sure an attraction that will be enjoyed by people of all ages. Located in Petra Jaya in the Kuching city North City Hall, everyone can enjoy this purr-fect destination with just a small fee of RM 3 each person.
Enquire

Sarawak Museum
A place that is sure to travel you back in time is the Sarawak Museum. With a proud title of having one the best collections in Southest Asia, both young and old are sure to find something intriguing and learn a thing or two about the history of Sarawak. With the museum being composed of two wings, it is situated at the Jln Tun Abang Haji Openg and is sure to be a blast from the past of a destination to go to for all ages that adds on a free admission.
Enquire

Kuching Waterfront
A place that is considered as the heart of Kuching is the famous Kuching Waterfront. Along with the beatiful scnery Kuching Waterfront is also packed with so many activities that will suite couples on a vacation. Everyday seems to have a new activity at the waterfront. In addition to this, Waterfront is stragetically located to many other attractions such as Carpenter Street, Little India and at night a hub for the buzzing nightlife. For those couples looking for a more city like attraction this place is perfect.
Enquire

Bako National Park
A treasured national park located ,Bako National Park is must see location for the nature lover couples. With an area of 27sq km, this seemingly small area is packed with a wide variety of vagetations and wildlife. Ranging from Borneo only vegetations to wild monkeys, Bako National Park is sure to be an attraction that will keep a couple in touch with nature.
Enquire

DBKU Orchid Garden
With a wide collection of Borneo orchids in the garden along with Sarawak's very own orchid the Normah Orchid, this is certainly an amzing location to vist. Additionally, the garden is located very convinetly to other attractions as well such as Astana and Fort Margherita.
Enquire

Damai Beach Resort
Located at the Damai beach, this beach resort is the perfect get away from the city into a lush life at the beach. Equipped with the modern comforts, you can enjoy one of Kuching's amazing white sand beaches with no hustles. This resort is a definite must for newly-wed couples looking for a beach themed honeymoon.
Enquire

Sarawak Cultural Village
A destination that will bring history to life is the Sarawak Cultural Villages. A 17-acres of land that is a living snippet of the past, this award-winning museum will make you learn about Sarawak's culture and heritage by making you experience it first hand. For people of all ages looking for portal to the past, this is your answer.
Enquire

Matang Wildlife Centre
A housing for the endangered wildlife native to Sarawak this destination is a location perfect for wild animal lovers. With the main attraction being orangutan adoption programme, the young orangutans, who were either orphaned or rescued from captivity, are taught how to survive in the wild.
Enquire

Tua Pek Kong Temple
A location perfect for anyone who has a passion for temples, this location is the answer. Sitting on a foothill and commanding the view over the river and Main Bazaar, the ornately decorated Tua Pek Kong Temple, which was one of the few buildings that survived the 1884 Great Fire of Kuching, is said to have the best Feng Shui location in the city. It is believed to date back to 1843 and has been on official records since 1876.
Enquire

img.alt: TThe Brooke Gallery at Fort Margherita

fieldset.div:
The Brooke Gallery at Fort Margherita
This location is a a gallery that tells the tale of Sarawak and its 'White Rajahs'. The destination is perfect to learn about Sarawak's hostory and vist a fort from the past.
Enquire
